programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Its Simply The Zest. Michael Symon prepares fluke Milanese and keeps things fresh with a shaved courgette salad. Liz tops it all off with a lemon drop martini.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Pork Roastin And Toastin. Michael Symon prepares smoked pork butt for pulled pork sandwiches along with crispy fried courgette chips with parmesan.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: Before heading to her friends cabin for the weekend, and since blueberries are in season, Zoë bakes her blueberry lattice bars and scones with wild blueberries.

programme.title: Zoe Bakes
programme.desc: For her new book about cookies, Zoës oatmeal raisin cookies pass her boys taste test, but she must start over when they dont like her raspberry Linzer.

programme.title: Bakers Dozen
programme.desc: Earth To Dessert. The bakers decorate beautiful miniature wedding cakes. The finalists must wow guest judge Loria Stern with an amazing dessert inspired by nature.

programme.title: Bobbys Triple Threat
programme.desc: The Titans face chef Claudette Zepeda, famous for her bold Mexican cuisine. Michael Voltaggio attempts an impossible dish in the time allowed.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: Holiday Baking Championship
programme.desc: Eight bakers show off their skills in this Holiday-themed baking competition series with the winner taking home a whopping $50,000. With three expert judges analysing their baked treats, every mistake is identified, so these eight bakers must whip, cream, and ice to perfection if they hope to progress to the final rounds of the competition. The challenges are of course Holiday-themed, thus testing their creativity and ability to adapt. Each episode is comprised of two rounds, with the worst performing baker eliminated every week until only one remains.

programme.title: Christmas Cookie Challenge
programme.desc: Reality competition for the festive period. A group of talented bakers hope to impress the judges with their Christmas cookies as they face a series of themed challenges. The judges will be looking for inventiveness, decorating skills and, of course, deliciously baked Christmas cookies. Whoever can wow the judges and blow away the competition will take home a huge cash prize.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Slepkavība Austrumu ekspresī
programme.desc: Ceļojums vienā no krāšņākajiem Eiropas vilcieniem pārvēršas vienā no sarežģītākajām un visaizraujošākajām mīklām kriminālistikas vēsturē. Savā kupejā miris tiek atrasts noslēpumainais amerikāņu miljonārs Rečets un nav šaubu, ka slepkava ir viens no pasažieriem. Kamēr puteņa dēļ vilciens ir apstājies un nošķirts no ārējās pasaules, detektīvam Eriklam Puaro ir jānoskaidro slepkava, pirms tas uzbruks atkal.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Episkā filma
programme.desc: Episkais ķinis ir ļoti episks, par to nešaubieties! Stāsta centrā ir četri bāreņi – vienu no tiem piedzīvojumā ierauj Luvras kuratora pēctecis, otrs grib kļūt par meksikāņu brīvības cīnītāju, trešo bāreni sastopam, pateicoties čūskām lidmašīnā, bet ceturtais ir puslīdz normāls mutants no X sabiedrības. Katrs no četriem mīklainos apstākļos tiek pie zelta biļetes, kas sniedz iespēju apmeklēt šokolādes fabriku. Viens pēc otra viņi iekuļas dīvainā drēbju skapī, kas nabagus aiztransportē uz Gnārnias zemi (ar G!). Tur viņi sastop ekstravagantu pirātu kapteini, kā arī nopietnus burvestību skolas studentus un noslēdz sadarbības līgumu ar gudru, bet seksuāli norūpējušos lauvu, lai pieveiktu ļauno Balto Kuci, kas uzkundzējusies Gnārnijā.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Līdz uzvaras vārtiem
programme.desc: Bez darba palikušais un alkoholu mīlošais futbola treneris Tomass Rongens dodas uz ASV Samoa, lai vadītu turienes komandu un palīdzētu tai sagatavoties Pasaules čempionāta atlases sacensībām. Galvenā problēma valsts komandas pastāvēšanās vēsturē - tā vēl nav ne reizi iesitusi nevienus vārtus saviem pretiniekiem un spēles laikā ir uzstādījusi antirekordu futbola vēsturē - ielaisti 31 vārti. Tomasu sagaida grūts darbs ne tikai ar komandu, bet arī pašam ar sevi.

programme.title: Džūdija
programme.desc: Leģendārā Džūdija Gārlenda 1968. gada ziemā ierodas Londonā, lai uzstātos izpārdotu koncertu sērijā.

programme.title: Robotu sapņi
programme.desc: Suņa un robota piedzīvojumi un neveiksmes Ņujorkā 80.-ajos gados.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Palaidnīgā feja
programme.desc: 337 gadus jaunajai zobu fejai Violetai maģija nešķiet īpaši aizraujoša, tāpēc viņa vienīgā nespēj nokārtot eksāmenu, lai iegūtu kristālu, kas fejām ļauj iekļūt cilvēku pasaulē. Violeta neļauj skumjām vaļu, nozog kristālu citai fejai un nokļūst 12 gadus vecās bārenītes Maksijas istabā. Tomēr, ak vai! Kristāls saplīst, un nu Violeta ir iesprostota cilvēku pasaulē! Kopā ar Maksiju viņa meklē atpakaļceļu un atklāj savu patieso aicinājumu.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Nezvēri
programme.desc: No dzimtenes izceļojis franču pāris Spānijas laukos vada organisko saimniecību, taču rodas nesaskaņas ar vietējiem ciemata iedzīvotājiem.

programme.title: Zirnekļtīkls
programme.desc: Astoņus gadus vecais Pīters ik vakaru savas istabas sienās dzird dīvainu klauvēšanu. Viņa vecāki Kerola un Marks apgalvo, ka pie vainas Pītera spilgtā iztēle, taču zēns ir pārliecināts: šajā mājā kaut kas nav kārtībā. Un pamazām atklājas tumšs noslēpums, ko tik cītīgi glabājuši viņa vecāki.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: Kaimiņu meitene
programme.desc: Mets nav no tiem jaunekļiem, kuri sarunā randiņus. Arī abi viņa draugi meitenes plikumus redzējuši tikai pornofilmās. Bet tad Metam kaimiņos ievācas satriecošs zaķis, kura turklāt izrāda viņam uzmanību un aicina uz randiņiem. Koledžas puiši acīmredzami Metu apskauž. Taču Mets vēl nav paspējis zaudēt nevainību satriecošās skaistules sabiedrībā, kad gaismā nāk fakts, ka meitene ir ... izbijusi pornofilmu aktrise.

programme.title: Bitīte Maija: Medus spēles
programme.desc: Bitīte Maija ir patīkami satraukta, jo tuvojas slavenās Medus spēles. Varbūt beidzot spiets tiks izraudzīts dalībai? Taču bitītes satraukums izgaist, kad viņa uzzina, ka strops nepiedalīsies spēlēs, turklāt puse ražas būs jāatdod spēļu dalībniekiem. Maijai tas šķiet netaisnīgi. Bez stropa karalienes atļaujas viņa grasās lidot uz Zumtropoli pie imperatores un lūgt atļauju stropam piedalīties spēlēs.

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Alita: Kaujas eņģelis
programme.desc: Pasauli iznīcinājis Lielais karš, sagraujot ikvienu pilsētu savā ceļā, izņemot to, zem kuras trīssimt gadu laikā ir izaugusi vēl viena, kur iedzīvotāji cīnās par labklājības druskām no virszemes. Apakšējās pilsētas izgāztuvē tādējādi nonāk arī kādas kiborgmeitenes atliekas, un doktoram Ido šķiet, ka viņa ir pārsteidzoši līdzīga briesmīgajiem kaujas eņģeļiem, kas reiz piedalījās Lielajā karā.

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Zeks un Vovo: Leģendāra leģenda
programme.desc: Iedomu pasaules sirdī, kurā mīt fantastiskas būtnes un bīstami briesmoņi, 13 gadus vecais Zaks dodas meklēt savu dvīņu brāli Kailu, kurš noslēpumaini pazudis.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Zvirbulis Ričijs kopš dzimšanas pieņemts stārķu ģimenē, visi viņu ļoti mīl, viņš ātri aug un jūtas kā īsts stārķis. Taču gājputniem stārķiem pienāk laiks lidot uz Āfriku, lai tur ziemotu. Ģimene ir spiesta atklāt Ričijam viņa izcelšanos, jo lidot kopā nedrīkst – grūtajā ceļojumā zvirbulis var iet bojā. Drosminieks negrasās nolaist spārnus un nolemj visiem pierādīt, ka ir īsts stārķis. Ričijs viens pats dodas ceļā, un viņam pievienojas jauni draugi – pūce Olga un papagailis Kiki.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Vīrs, vārdā Oto
programme.desc: Stāsts par nīgru atraitni, vārdā Oto Andersons, kura vienīgais prieciņš ir ķīvēšanās ar izmisušajiem kaimiņiem un viņu kritizēšana. Kad viņam blakus durvīs ievācas kāda jauna ģimene, asprātīgajā grūtniecē Marisolā viņš sastopas ar līdzvērtīgu pretinieku. Šī satikšanās izvēršas par negaidītu draudzību, kas apvērsīs Oto pasauli kājām gaisā.

programme.title: Eilīna
programme.desc: Eilīna strādā zēnu pāraudzināšanas iestādē. Kad kolektīvam pievienojas jauna psiholoģe, Eilīnai ar viņu rodas īpašs kontakts. Bet viņu attiecības pavisam drīz uzņem grēcīgu pavērsienu.

programme.title: Atstātie
programme.desc: 1970. gada Ziemassvētki. Prestižā skolā uz svētku brīvdienām paliek visu nīstais skolotājs Pols, skolas pavāre Mērija un piecpadsmit gadus vecais Anguss. Pa šīm dienām šie tik ļoti atšķirīgie cilvēki ne tikai iemācīsies sadzīvot un saprast viens otru, bet arī mainīs viens otra dzīves uz visiem laikiem.

programme.title: Balerīna
programme.desc: Slepkava, apmācīta Ruska Roma organizācijas tradīcijās, dodas atriebt tēva nāvi.

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Olympiacos Piraeus - Zalgiris Kaunas
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: NBA. Oklahoma City Thunder - Los Angeles Lakers
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Atletico Madrid - Levante
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

Holmes Family Rescue
programme.desc: Mike Holmes, his daughter Sherry and son Michael share their expertise to rescue homeowners from botched construction jobs and renovation fatigue.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. In each episode, cameras will follow the couple as they tour low-priced older houses across America and ultimately choose which ones to feature on their famous site.

programme.title: Cheap Old Houses
programme.desc: Cheap Old Houses is inspired by Ethan and Elizabeth Finkelsteins uber popular Instagram feed by the same name, which racks up millions of views with images of surprising property bargains that are architecturally intact and available for under $150,000. programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Page Turner brings her team, money and tough love to help overwhelmed flippers get their wayward projects back on track.

programme.title: Beach Hunters
programme.desc: Reality show revolves around homes on the sand in the most stunning beaches. The hosts are travelling to the exquisite destinations trying to help the potential buyers to find the house of their dream. Together they examine properties and choose the one according to their taste, budget and of coarse location. Take a look at some absolutely gorgeous houses on the white sand with a magnificent view of the sea, a dream of each and everyone.

programme.title: Beach Hunters

The hosts are travelling to the exquisite destinations trying to help the potential buyers to find the house of their dream. Together they examine properties and choose the one according to their taste, budget and of coarse location. Take a look at some absolutely gorgeous houses on the white sand with a magnificent view of the sea, a dream of each and everyone.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Build Me Up
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Windy City Rehab
programme.desc: Windy City Rehab is a reality renovation show hosted by interior designer Alison Victoria. She and her expert team buy and restore old homes in her beloved Chicago historic neighborhoods. It is much more than a simple improvement of a house. Alison and her team are rescuing vintage houses and hold true to the original style and architecture as much as possible. They do their best to pay tribute to the historic roots, while integrating some modern makeovers.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: American reality television series. Married couple Chip and Johanna Gaines own a home renovation and redecoration service in Waco, Texas, and had worked on over 100 homes before the show. They begin with showing a hopeful couple three potential homes to purchase in central Texas, all of which require a significant amount of repair or renovation. Once the couple have chosen the home they like, Johanna designs the renovations and Chip is the lead contractor. Buyers usually have an overall budget of under $200,000 with at least $30,000 in renovations.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: Two sisters in New York team up to salvage a decaying cottage built in 1900 and turn it into their vision of a quaint cosy retreat for tourists.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: New parents dream of turning an LA fixer into a luxurious Mediterranean-inspired home. But their high-end designs just might break their budget.

programme.title: Fix My Flip
programme.desc: Page helps flipping partners sell a home they bought next to a pig farm.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese take on a couple who bought their home sight unseen, and they get a shocking surprise with an alarming electrical issue.

programme.title: Scariest House In America
programme.desc: Retta explores a former funeral parlour with a deadly past, a haunted family house on top of a graveyard, and a witchy home with a snake problem.

programme.title: Scariest House In America
programme.desc: Retta tours an abandoned warehouse with a puzzling surprise, a haunted Victorian funeral parlour, and a creepy home with deadly decor.

programme.title: Beach Hunters
programme.desc: Reality show revolves around homes on the sand in the most stunning beaches. The hosts are travelling to the exquisite destinations trying to help the potential buyers to find the house of their dream. Together they examine properties and choose the one according to their taste, budget and of coarse location. Take a look at some absolutely gorgeous houses on the white sand with a magnificent view of the sea, a dream of each and everyone.

Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Tiny House, Big Living
programme.desc: Documentary series showing the journey of people in America who are joining the tiny-house movement, where people are actively choosing to live in smaller houses. We follow the construction process of houses that are often less than 500 square feet. We see the challenges the builders face when constructing a small home and ingenuous space-saving ideas they come up with to make the most of the limited floorspace. This show meets single people, couples and families who explain how they reached this decision to downsize to a mini-home, or why they have picked a small house as their first home. For some this is a financial decision, trying to avoid the large cost of living that comes with a standard house. Others are doing this for ecological reasons. Some are following their dreams of a simpler lifestyle.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: A couple began renovations on their home when one of them suddenly passed away. Now, Jenn is taking the reins to help the widow finish their dream home.

programme.title: No Demo Reno
programme.desc: Jenn swoops in to help a busy family complete their DIY renovations, delivering his dream of a luxury Vegas bathroom with her love of coastal design.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: With their clients baby on the way, Mike and Denese race to correct death-trap stairs and a kitchen with a foul secret.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese strive to fix a house whose additions gained lots of space, but little function, for a nervous client with a Thanksgiving deadline.

programme.title: Bargain Block
programme.desc: Bargain Block follows home renovation experts and partners Keith Bynum and Evan Thomas on their journey to restore Detroits iconic American neighborhoods one house at a time. With sound advice and support from their friend—lifetime Detroit resident and real estate expert Shea Hicks-Whitfield, who is expecting her first child—Keith and Evan buy multiple rundown and abandoned houses on a single block, take them down to the studs, and create affordable, stylish and fully furnished starter homes that are ideal for first-time homebuyers. Now settled in the Motor City, the couple, who have renovated and purchased their own home and opened a new retail store and workshop, infuse every property with a functional layout, artful design and beautiful repurposed furniture. The end result is incredible transformations of dilapidated homes that are an inspiration to the entire neighborhood.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: Scariest House In America

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.desc: Newlyweds turn to Izzy to update their 1960s home. But after unexpectedly losing a job, theyre hoping that he can stick to their strict budget.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Sometimes the strangest things on Earth are happening just below its surface. From tunnels carved by giant sloths to desperate attempts to stop the dead from rising again, these are the tales of the beasts, hidden cities and impossible creatures.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Greatest Mysteries with Laurence Fishburne
programme.desc: Experts believed they knew what caused the Hindenburg disaster, but there may be more to this story. Whatever triggered the explosion, it didnt just spell doom for the Hindenburg but for the entire rigid airship industry.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: The Tesla Files
programme.desc: Documentary series that investigates mysteries surrounding the work of inventor Nikola Tesla, one of the most important and eccentric scientists in history. In the late 19th and early 20th century, Nikola Tesla invented alternating current, developed radio and cell phone technology, conceived of wireless electricity, remote control and electric cars, and devised a mega-weapon more deadly than the atomic bomb. Researcher Marc Seifer, astrophysicist Travis Taylor, and investigative journalist Jason Stapleton try to unravel the mystery of Teslas missing files, which were confiscated by the US government after he died in 1943. Did they contain his plans for free worldwide electricity? Or his designs for a death ray? Tune in and find out!

programme.title: The Curse of Civil War Gold
programme.desc: The Curse of Civil War Gold is a non-fiction series about American Civil War history. Michigan native, part time treasure hunter Kevin Dykstra and his team search for lost treasures of Civil War Gold, estimated to be worth millions of dollars. They join forces with Marty Lagina from The Curse of Oak Island trying to solve the mystery and find the lost gold. The story goes that Union soldiers tracked down Confederate president Jefferson Davis in 1865 and confiscated his gold. Later it was smuggled north and ended up in Lake Michigan. And this is exactly where Kevin and his crew head to.

programme.title: Cities of the Underworld
programme.desc: Don Wildman heads beneath the skyscrapers and street vendors into a New York that few have ever seen. From a hidden Freemason tunnel and secret world of the Sandhogs, were uncovering the secret societies that built New York.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.desc: Don Wildman heads beneath the skyscrapers and street vendors into a New York that few have ever seen. From a hidden Freemason tunnel and secret world of the Sandhogs, were uncovering the secret societies that built New York.

programme.title: Gold Hunters: Legend of the Superstition Mountains
programme.desc: Reality show that follows a group of modern day treasure hunters who search for the Lost Dutchman mine in the Superstition mountain range of Arizona. The promise of a $200 million has lured thousands of treasure hunters for years. Hunting for the Lost Dutchman is typically a one-man journey, but lifelong seeker Wayne Tuttle is breaking tradition and partnering with a team of experts to follow a newly revealed clue that could finally solve the 500-year-old mystery of Americas most famous and deadliest buried treasure. They will encounter many real life dangers on their adventure, leaving you on the edge of your seats in each episode.

programme.title: River Hunters
programme.desc: Documentary series in which YouTube sensation Beau Ouimette, an experienced river detectorist, teams up with presenter Rick Edwards, to search the UKs rivers and waterways in an attempt to find underwater archaeological treasures. The pair wil visit some of the most historically significant sites across Britain, where some iconic events and battles took place. By using state-of-the-art technology, archive maps and contemporaneous accounts from the period, they will find various artefacts under layers of silt and rocks, which they will take to local archaeologists and historians to uncover the stories behind the finds.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: Documentary series that features computer-generated imagery and computer graphics of astronomical objects in the universe as well as interviews with experts of cosmology, astronomy, and astrophysics. It has been fifty years since the man traveled to outer space, but there are too many secrets unrevealed. The series reconstructs life on other planets and galaxies, fantasizes about life and all its possible forms in other atmospheres. You can witness space accidents, parallel universe, the velocity of light and discover new facts about mysterious outer space.

programme.title: Where Did It Come From?
programme.desc: Documentary series exploring the history of Earths greatest man-made structures and creations. Where Did It Come From? reveals the earliest examples of brilliance and ingenuity from past pioneers. From the Roman highway project; a civil engineering feat establishing a network of unprecedented highways, to Egypts iconic structures, this series reveals the incomprehensible ides brought to life by magnificent minds, and in some cases, brutal slavery. Join host Michael Guillen as he dives into this fascinating world of both civil and social engineering, born out of ideas we still use today.

programme.title: Unidentified: Inside Americas UFO Investigation
programme.desc: This documentary series features testimony from Luis Elizondo, former military intelligence official and Special Agent In-Charge at the Pentagons mysterious program, The Advanced Aerospace Threat Identification Program (AATIP). This secretive military department was tasked with researching and investigating Unidentified Aerial Phenomena (UAP) which included numerous video clips, three of which were released to a shocked public in 2017. In this six-part series, Elizondo speaks out about his concerns for national security and the Pentagons lack of response to these potential threats. Episodes include fighter pilots from the USS Nimitz describing their terrifying encounter with a UFO; the lights seen in the sky above a New Jersey turnpike; and a saucer-shaped craft observed over Chicagos OHare airport.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Clash of the Gods
programme.desc: Documentary series that in each episode explains the heroic and tragic life of various figures from Greek and Norse mythologies - the most powerful monsters, heroes and Gods, including Thor, Hercules, Beowulf, Minotaur, Odysseus and Zeus. This series will answer these and many other questions, and experts will connect the myths we all know to actual historical events, and link the stories to mythologies of other cultures as well.

programme.title: Reasonable Doubt
programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.

programme.desc: As we all know, the initial verdict in a trial is not always the final outcome as many trial jury decisions are often overturned on appeal. However, the appeals process can take a significant amount of time to go through the system and also incur enormous costs on the individuals involved. This show follows the work of two investigators who re-examine the verdicts in contentious murder cases and assess the prospects of a successful appeal for the families of the people convicted of the crimes to determine if they should appeal or accept the verdict. Each episode traces the developments in the case, whether it be new evidence or witness testimony, which can then shed light on the innocence of the convicted person or show that, indeed, they are guilty of the crime and the verdict was correct.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: At 16, Terry Hunt murders Trisha Stemple in a gruesome murder-for-hire and goes to prison for the crime. Thirty years later, he seeks redemption.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: The Killer Speaks
programme.desc: Raised in foster care, Kristin and Brandon only had each other. Now, Kristin struggles to understand how her big brother became a cold-blooded killer.

programme.title: Murder Comes to Town
programme.desc: Tune in and hear the real-life stories of gruesome crimes that occured in small towns across America. Small towns are often synonymous with peaceful and care-free life. But seemingly peaceful places mentioned in this series have become known for its shocking murders. Following the first person accounts of investigators and townsfolk, each episode unravels the crazy rumors and terrifying truths behind unthinkable crimes and follows police as they put together each clue in an attempt to bring the culprit to justice.

programme.title: Stranger Among Us
programme.desc: Stranger Among Us is an American crime drama series telling real-life stories about terrible murder cases that occurred inside well-established and close communities, like a tight circle of Chicago doctors, West-Virginia firefighters, or a group of train hoppers. After the communities welcome a mysterious newcomer strange things start to happen, revealing that not everything is as it seems. The answers always lead to one of the group members.

programme.title: Shattered
programme.desc: Documentary series that looks at the impact a single crime can have on multiple lives. The show unearths past homicide cases that are still causing distress among the involved families today. Whether its witnesses, families of the victims, or law enforcement officers, each episode provides a unique perspective on the committed crime, with the three tales slowly intertwining into one. Shattered explores the ripple effect that flows through entire communities after such harrowing crimes and, with the help of re-enactments and these personal accounts, shows the eternal pain that will burden these families forever.

programme.title: Someone You Thought You Knew
programme.desc: Someone You Thought You Knew is a a true-crime series uncovering the uncomfortable truth about crimes. Whenever somebody is murdered or disappears, everybody from the close group of friends and relatives of the victims automatically become suspects number 1. And you will be surprised but in most cases victims suffer from someone they know and trust. Follow sinister stories of master manipulators and murderers being close to the victims, look at the reenactments of the crime and listen to the witnesses, detectives and investigators, speaking out the cold-blooded truth.

programme.title: I Almost Got Away With It
programme.desc: Different crimes, different stories one clear motive: to stay out of prison. This series profiles true stories of the accused, who tried to avoided arrest and capture for their crime. Almost getting away with it. Following these convicts and their attempts and successions of escaping American prisons after being sentenced. Some are on the run for only a week, others evade the law for years and in rare cases even for decades. What pushed these fugitives to crime and to what extent are willing to go to avoid justice.

programme.title: The Friday the 13th Murders
programme.desc: After a call on Friday the 13th, Jose Herran vanishes. As police dig in, they find a town where fear reigns, pain is ritual, and horror thrives.

programme.title: The Real Murders on Elm Street
programme.desc: A hunter finds bones in the Pennsylvania woods. It seems like a bear attack - until a confession reveals a brutal betrayal by those he trusts most.

programme.title: O.J. and Nicole: An American Tragedy
programme.desc: Tanya Brown, sister of Nicole Brown Simpson, explores O.J. and Nicoles tumultuous relationship and the infamous trial of the century.

programme.title: The Friday the 13th Murders

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Андрюху закрыли в ментовке, Ольга и Гриша пытаются его вытащить. Аня, лежащая на сохранении, хочет выяснить где ее возлюбленный, а Лена с Тимой придумывают отмазки, чтобы не усугублять и без того тяжелую беременность. У Юргена заканчивается "успокоительное" и он пускается во все тяжкие, чтобы его раздобыть.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Астрофизики обнаружили труднообъяснимое явление в Солнечной системе. Ученые доказали, что пищевые зависимости существуют: от каких продуктов? Как в Калифорнии предупреждают жителей о землетрясениях? Чем нарколепсия отличается от сна и как она возникает?

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Утро Ольги и Гриши начинается с суровых разборок. Они уже не первый месяц вместе, но Гриша хочет большего. Аня вот-вот родит, она очень гордится Андрюхой, который из чертановских гопарей рванул аж в секретари помощника депутата. У Лены виртуальный роман с зэком Максом. Юрген вышел из психушки и вроде не пьет, но ведет себя подозрительно. Тимофей решает подловить деда.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Андрюху закрыли в ментовке, Ольга и Гриша пытаются его вытащить. Аня, лежащая на сохранении, хочет выяснить где ее возлюбленный, а Лена с Тимой придумывают отмазки, чтобы не усугублять и без того тяжелую беременность. У Юргена заканчивается "успокоительное" и он пускается во все тяжкие, чтобы его раздобыть.

programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Деревня Красное — единственный населённый пункт на острове Никольский, что находится в устье Северной Двины. Среди многих, похожих на неё архангельских деревень, она вполне могла бы занять особое место. Ведь ещё в середине 90-х здесь установили два огромных белоснежных ветрогенератора — чтобы обеспечить Красное электричеством. И всё бы ничего, но с возобновляемой энергией деревня так и не подружилась — ветряки сломали и растащили. А на их месте остались лишь бетонные блоки. Электричество в Красном есть, но по часам. От дизельного генератора. Топливо для которого сюда привозят на кораблях и лодках.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Друзья
programme.desc: Шестеро друзей - Рейчел, Моника, Фиби, Джоуи, Чендлер и Росс - живут по соседству, вместе убивают время, делятся секретами и иногда очень сильно влюбляются.

programme.title: Завтрак в постель
programme.desc: Арина Волошина работает горничной в отеле. У нее за плечами неоконченное высшее по менеджменту, в мечтах - открытие своей гостиницы, а в реальности - тяжелая работа и маленькая дочка Таня, растущая без отца. Однажды в отель на бизнес-семинар съезжаются важные гости. Среди них капризная дама - бывшая балерина Ирина Штайн, а также молодой миллионер Артем Гордин, возглавляющий список самых завидных женихов страны. Арина случайно принимает Гордина за нового работника и не церемонится с ним. Артем же, давно уставший от постоянного внимания и фальшивых улыбок, захотел почувствовать себя обыкновенным человеком. Он решает подыграть Арине и не рассказывать, кто же он на самом деле…

programme.title: Завтрак в постель
programme.desc: Арина Волошина работает горничной в отеле. У нее за плечами неоконченное высшее по менеджменту, в мечтах - открытие своей гостиницы, а в реальности - тяжелая работа и маленькая дочка Таня, растущая без отца. programme.title: Азия
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Неизвестная Россия
programme.desc: Поселок Верхний Нюд стоит в живописных местах Мурманской области — среди красивых сопок, лугов и озёр, полных рыбы. Казалось бы, жить, да жить. Вот только уже 20 лет Верхний Нюд это мёртвый посёлок, здесь никто не живёт. Потому что в конце 90-х его жителей переселили в соседний город Мончегорск. С его горно-металлургическим комбинатом и соответствующей экологией. Тогда власти объяснили, что содержать Верхний Нюд — с его угасающим совхозом и ухудшающейся демографией — просто невыгодно. Но многие из бывших жителей посёлка надеются на ренессанс Верхнего Нюда. Ведь в его окрестностях геологи нашли залежи ценных металлов - платины и палладия. И возможно вскоре на остатках совхозных коровников появятся буры и экскаваторы. А в Верхний Нюд вновь вернутся люди.

programme.title: Провинциальная Мадонна
programme.desc: Надя влюбляется в жениха своей старшей сестры Натальи. Она борется со своим чувством ежедневно: Наталья беременна, Сергей женится на ней и переезжает к ним в дом. К Наде он относится, как к младшей сестренке, хотя они одинаково на многое смотрят, в то время как Наталья ссорится с мужем, упрекая в безденежье. Сергей терпит все ради сына Миши. В конце концов Сергей уезжает на заработки, а приехав на побывку, видит жену в объятиях любовника. Сергей подает на развод, а Наталья не позволяет ему видеться с сыном. Наде приходится отказаться от мечты о мединституте и остаться дома, чтобы помогать матери и сестре…

programme.title: Провинциальная Мадонна
programme.desc: Надя влюбляется в жениха своей старшей сестры Натальи. Она борется со своим чувством ежедневно: Наталья беременна, Сергей женится на ней и переезжает к ним в дом. К Наде он относится, как к младшей сестренке, хотя они одинаково на многое смотрят, в то время как Наталья ссорится с мужем, упрекая в безденежье. Сергей терпит все ради сына Миши. В конце концов Сергей уезжает на заработки, а приехав на побывку, видит жену в объятиях любовника. Сергей подает на развод, а Наталья не позволяет ему видеться с сыном. Наде приходится отказаться от мечты о мединституте и остаться дома, чтобы помогать матери и сестре…

programme.title: Орёл и Решка. Земляне
programme.desc: Michelle Andrade и Кирилл Макашов отправились в Грузию, чтобы познакомиться с самыми гостеприимными землянами во всем мире. Для грузина гость - настоящий подарок. Они охотно помогут, накормят, напоят и приютят на ночлег любого путешественника. Кирилл Макашов будет шиковать с золотой картой в кармане и увидит, где живут и как отдыхают самые богатые грузины. А Michelle Andrade поднимется по "дороге смерти" в самый высокогорный район в Грузии Тушети и познакомится с единственными землянами во всей Европе, которые живут так высоко в горах....

programme.title: Анатомия убийства
programme.desc: Евгения Волкова - женщина с непростой профессией и непростой судьбой. Она - патологоанатом, и у нее есть тайна, которая заставляет ее бежать из родного города и устроиться простой сиделкой в богатый подмосковный дом. Вскоре выясняется причина, по которой открылась вакансия: предыдущая сиделка Раисы Самсоновой погибла при таинственных обстоятельствах. Мириться со скелетами в шкафу не в характере Евгении. Она узнает все неприглядные секреты этого, на первый взгляд, благонравного семейства и находит убийцу. В расследовании ей помогает сосед - красивый мужчина с ироничным взглядом, прикованный к инвалидному креслу. Как выясняет Евгения, он зарабатывает на жизнь, сочиняя женские романы под псевдонимом Наталья Душевная. Но это далеко не все, что он скрывает…

programme.title: Пять минут тишины. Возвращение
programme.desc: Александр Грек, вернувшись после стажировки в Москву и узнав, что его невеста Лина, с которой он собирался окончательно расстаться, беременна, принимает решение жениться на матери своего ребенка. Однако остаться в столице у него не получается: ему уготована служба в отдалённом районе, и он просит направить его назад, в Карелию. Лина решает ехать с ним и там играть свадьбу. Вернувшись в Карелию, Греку предстоит пережить объяснение с Таней, которую он любит, и с Гиреевым, который зол на молодого человека, заставившего страдать его дочь.

programme.title: Балтия неделя
programme.desc: Лаура Шмидеберга родилась в Латвии, работала на латвийском телевидении и в кино, но неожиданно уехала в Эстонию. В Таллинне стала ювелиром, мастером по изготовлению стеклянных украшений. Теперь "Лаура Шмидеберга" - это товарный знак одной из лучших в Эстонии художественных мастерских по стеклу.

programme.title: Детали
programme.desc: Как определяют, написан ли текст человеком или искусственным интеллектом? Новый уровень подвижности у "мягких" роботов. Машинное обучение помогает распознавать признаки деменции на ранних стадиях. На МКС пробуют создать посуду из небьющегося стекла.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Ольга узнает, что у Андрюхи новый следак, и одной взяткой ей теперь не отделаться. Гриша напивается с горя — Ольга ему совсем не доверяет. Бабуля впрягается за внука, но дело принимает совершенно неожиданный оборот. Юрген считает, что держит все под контролем, но его зависимость приводит его в довольно щекотливую ситуацию.

programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Ольга готова на все, только бы вытащить из кутузки будущего зятя, а Юрген готов на все ради порции "успокоительного". Ольга встречается с прокурором, а Юрген грабит родную психушку. Ане надоело лежать на сохранении без дела и она решает сама вытащить Андрюху. Гриша и его бабушка сильно насолили чертановским "помощникам депутата", пришло время отвечать.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. Со сверстниками тоже не ладится, ведь Шелдона куда больше детских игрушек интересует, где можно взять обогащённый уран для научных экспериментов.

programme.title: Детство Шелдона
programme.desc: История о непростом детстве вундеркинда Шелдона Купера. Родители юного гения не разделяют увлечения сына наукой: его мать очень религиозна, а отец, бывший футбольный тренер, предпочитает проводить вечера в компании пива и телевизора. programme.title: Ольга
programme.desc: Ольга готова на все, только бы вытащить из кутузки будущего зятя, а Юрген готов на все ради порции "успокоительного". Ольга встречается с прокурором, а Юрген грабит родную психушку.
